text: having won is Helen here today I'm going
to make a tangy and sweet stir-fried
dish with squid and some other
vegetables like pineapple tomatoes and
onion if you like you can also use other
vegetables like bell peppers celery etc
it's a great dish to serve over a bowl
of hot steamed rice it's a very easy
dish to make
but the problem most people have when
they make this dish is that the squid
shrinks a lot and it's produced too much
liquid and in this video I'm going to
show you a secret
to prevent that so let's begin recipes
for ingredients you're gonna need
hundred gram of squid to medium size
tomatoes about two more gram a cucumber
and a small onion about 200 gram or
seven hours of pineapple some spring
onion and cilantro cut the pie Pole in
quarters remove the core and cut into
slices cut the onion into wedges and cut
the wedges in half
remove the ball ends of the GU Kimber
and also the soft part inside cut into
about half an inch thick slices on the
diagonal remove the seeds of the
tomatoes and also cut into the same size
at the onion to prepare the squid remove
the head to detach it from the body then
rinse well Poona of the quill and remove
the outer skin be careful not to break
the ink pocket and the eyes because the
ink can splash and staying your
uploaders then cut the squid into rings
season the squid with a tablespoon of
minced garlic 1/2 a teaspoon of chicken
stock
a quarter teaspoon of salt and a quarter
teaspoon of pepper
mix well one trick to prevent the
squeeze from shrinking and releasing too
much liquid it to add one egg white and
a teaspoon of tapioca starch mix well
and set aside for about 10 minutes
hit a pan on medium and add a tablespoon
of vegetable oil then fry some minced
garlic and shallots until fragrance then
add the script and quickly stir fry over
high heat for about 2 minutes when the
script turned quite opaque add the
vegetables and stir well tend to the egg
white and the stock the squid do not
produce any liquid at all seasoned with
2 tbsp of fish sauce a tablespoon of
oyster sauce and half a teaspoon of
chicken stock stir well until the
vegetables are quite cooked force to
maintain its crunchiness then garnish
with some chopped green onions and is
done transfer the serving plate and
garnish with some cilantro and pepper on
top this is a great dish to serve with
hot steamed rice is colorful
for about 2 mins very nutritious and
good for you give the recipe a try and
let me know what you think if you like
the recipe don't forget to click on the
like button and also subscribe to my
channel for more delicious Vietnamese
foods
thank you for watching bye bye
